chunk_text:
Music will stop playing at 10 PM. #### Is there a sound ordinance? Yes. All caterers, bartenders, and dessert service providers must be licensed and insured and approved by WHV. #### Do you allow outside catering? No. We do allow outside licensed and insured bartending services with approval of WHV.**WHV does offer bartending service for a fee**
**depending on the number of guests.** This would include bartenders, glassware, ice, & garnishments. Cocktails can be added for an additional fee.
